Text.Page: Do you know how to make {@RawItem:206816}? There's plenty of {@RawItem:206811} around here, but it's not all that safe to recover. Could you procure some {@RawItem:206816} for me? Don't look at me like thatâ€”I'm unarmed!
Oh, this will do nicely. Much obliged, <PCNAME>. I'll put this to good use.
You haven't got it yet? You know how to mine and polish, right?
